channel.title: Health - Help
channel.description:
I don't really know where to post this. I know this forum is not for.. health related things, but it would be nice if someone helped because i have no clue what to do, and google is giving lots of things like stomach virus, food poisoning.. and other things. Here are some things that have been happening..
I feel weird when i look, hear, or smell food. (But today at lunch i could eat normally, but 2 hours later this happen again) I had painful diarrhea last night, but not today. (Really hurt coming out) 3 days ago i stayed up allnight, did not sleep for 30 hours (i think), i had a shivers the next day. I went to bed after 30 hours then woke up 2-3 hours later and went to the bathroom and through up. Any ideas..? Just wait it out? Go to the doctor?

item.title: Health - Help
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Stomach flu, i’ve had that shit over Thanksgiving break. Was up all night freezing my ass off, nauseous, horrible diarrhea, and dehydrated, threw up all I ate. It felt like I was going to die lol

Read full topic

item.title: Health - Help
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“nickog15, post:10, topic:480602”]I live in germany. I had a 16 OZ redbull on the night that i stayed up. When i wake up in the morning i feel fine, till i drink something then my stomach rumbles. I feel a bit better today, just sleepy. @the elve age, sense i live in germany, would i still be able to get it? The video i watch just says drink water and stay away from people and wait till it passes.[/quote]It started in Australia, so not only US

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15

I live in germany. I had a 16 OZ redbull on the night that i stayed up. When i wake up in the morning i feel fine, till i drink something then my stomach rumbles. item.title: Health - Help
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

NOROVIRUS

http://abcnews.go.com/blogs/health/2013/01/26/doctors-warn-of-new-stomach-superbug-hitting-u-s/

Pretty serious, I’d go to a doctor ASAP.

Read full topic

Go to a doctor… ?

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Get your thyroid checked

Read full topic

item.title: Health - Help
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Could possibly be poisoning. When I had food poisoning, I had a splitting headache that was so bad it literally hurt to think, I had constant diarrhea and also threw just as much as I shit. It wasn’t pleasant at all. Anyway, we are no doctors, have you tried going to one?

Read full topic

item.title: Health - Help
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Are you drinking energy drinks by any chance?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You shouldn’t come to a runescape forum for health issues… Go to your doctor.

Read full topic

I don’t really know where to post this. I know this forum is not for… health related things, but it would be nice if someone helped because i have no clue what to do, and google is giving lots of things like stomach virus, food poisoning… and other things. I feel weird when i look, hear, or smell food. (But today at lunch i could eat normally, but 2 hours later this happen again)
